name: Chilling Winds
description:
Chilling Winds is a psychological horror-survival game in which the player lives the unfortunate events of 6 people who experienced paranormal experiences in the city of Buenos Aires. All of them are linked to the famous urban legends of the place.

Cecilia.art - concept art
Dalkien - game design, production
ma(ria) lucia - 3D art
Todist - game design, programming
WallyG - concept art, music & FX
